title: Red Harissa
ingredients: 2large red bell peppers, roasted, peeled, and seeded (see page 155)
1¼cups (300 ml) vegetable or extra-virgin olive oil
directions: Put all the ingredients in a food processor and process to an almost smooth paste, stopping to scrape down the sides of the processor bowl every now and then. Store in a glass container with a tight-fitting lid in the fridge for up to 1 month.
